offline.title: Sorry, we're offline!

updating.message: Please, wait while we update our community to a newer software version.

deleted.title: This member doesn't exist!
deleted.message: Seems like you're trying to view a member that doesn't exist or has been deleted.

banned.title: You've been banned!
banned.message: You're not allowed to read, post or reply threads.

not_found.title: The requested page was not found.
not_found.message: Seems like the page you're trying to visit doesn't exist.

server_error.title: An unexpected error occurred.
server_error.message:
This may have occurred because of an internal server error.
If the error persists contact the community administrator.

forbidden.title: Access denied!
forbidden.message: You don't have permission to open this page.

help.title: Help Topics
help.no_topics: There are no help topics to show.

login.title: Log In
login.not_member: Is not a member? Sign up here!

messenger.title: Messenger
messenger.subject: Subject
messenger.no_pm_inbox: There are no private messages to show.
messenger.no_pm_sent: There are no sent private messages to show.

notification.sent: Your personal message has been successfully sent.
notification.unable_to_load: Unable to load the personal message.

register.title: Create Account
register.eula: We are not responsible for any messages posted. The messages express the views of the author of the message, not necessarily the views of this community. Messages that harass, abuse or threaten other members; have obscene or otherwise objectionable content; have spam, commercial or advertising content or links may be removed and may result in the loss of your account. Please do not post any private information unless you want it to be available publicly. Never assume that you are completely anonymous and cannot be identified by your posts.
register.captcha_description: Only letters. Just making sure you're human.

done.success: You have successfully registered your account.
done.validate: Please, check your e-mail to complete registration.

notification.required: All fields are required. If they're not filled, the registration can't continue.
notification.username: Username must be between 3 and 20 characters.
notification.already_exists: Username or e-mail address already exists.
notification.captcha: The entered CAPTCHA key doesn't match.

report.title: Report Abuse
report.notice:
Please, describe the abusive behavior exhibited.
All reports are kept strictly confidential.
report.option_2: Impersonating me or someone I know

room.no_threads: There are no threads to be shown. What about starting a new one?

search.title: Search
search.no_results: Your search for %s returned no results.

thread.no_replies: This thread has no replies. Be the first one!
thread.delete_confirm: Do you want to delete this post? This operation cannot be undone!
thread.no_related_threads: There are no related threads to show.

mod.title: Moderation Options
mod.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this thread? This action CANNOT be undone!

notification.reported: You have successfully reported this thread.
notification.post_reported: You have successfully reported a post in this thread.
notification.deleted: You have successfully deleted your post.
notification.locked: You have successfully locked this thread.
notification.unlocked: You have successfully unlocked this thread.
notification.announcement_set: You have successfully set this thread as announcement
notification.announcement_remove: You have successfully removed this thread as announcement.
notification.title_post_empty: Title and post content are required fields.

poll.question: Poll Question
poll.description: Put one answer per line. Maximum 15 answers.

auto.title: Set thread auto-open/lock date
auto.description: Define when the thread will be opened and locked. To not use this feature, leave all fields as is.
auto.details: NOTE: The thread opening/lock dates are based on the default community timezone (currently set as %s hours in Admin CP), not the member's timezone. This is to ensure that all members view the topic at the same time regardless of where they are.
auto.open_at: Open at... <small>(leave blank to post immediately)</small>
auto.lock_at: And lock at... <small>(leave blank to not set a locking time)</small>

summary.title: Summary
summary.total_posts: Total number of posts to date
summary.average_posts: Average number of posts per day

profile.email_hide: Hide e-mail address from other users

avatar.title: Avatar
avatar.gravatar_message:
Gravatar is a service for providing globally unique avatars.
Your gravatar is associated with your e-mail address.

Edit or create your Gravatar accessing www.gravatar.com.

notification.success: Your avatar has been changed successfully.

cover.title: Cover Photo
cover.info: If none is set, then your avatar is your cover photo.
